subject: Music
title: Ticketmaster and the Ticketing Wars
description: A quick win: understand Ticketmaster and the Ticketing Wars.

hook.text: Ticketmaster's Eras Tour presale crash triggered a U.S. Senate hearing.

buildup.text: Ticketmaster merged with Live Nation in 2010, controlling venues, promotion, and ticketing.

discovery.text: Service fees add 25-40% to ticket face value. The fee breakdown between platform and venue is opaque.

twist.text: Dynamic pricing raises costs with demand. Artists sometimes blame Ticketmaster but quietly approve.

climax.text: The DOJ filed an antitrust suit against Live Nation in 2024. It could reshape the entire industry.

punchline.text: Controlling the door beats performing on stage.

quiz.question: What is Ticketmaster's 'dynamic pricing'?
options: Discounting unsold tickets at the last minute
Algorithmically raising prices based on demand
Letting fans bid auction-style for seats
